sentences.en: Again, the pain locked me into immobility.
sentences.cn: 我又一次痛得动弹不得。

sentences.en: Al would come back stronger than before, using his forced immobility to work out with weights.
sentences.cn: 但当他回来工作后,却比以前更加强健了.

sentences.en: If sleep paralysis is an example of too much immobility, so-called REMbehavior disorder is an example of too little.
sentences.cn: 如果睡眠瘫痪症是过于静止的例子，那么所谓快速眼动行为障碍就是一个太不安静的例子。

sentences.en: NEW point of immobility in the stars.
sentences.cn: 天极点则在星空中不动.

sentences.en: Risk factors for development of pressure ulcers include immobility, incontinence, and nutritional deficits.
sentences.cn: 风险因素对发展的压力溃疡包括固步自封, 尿失禁, 和营养赤字.

sentences.en: This is due to a stagnation of blood in the veins caused by prolonged immobility, which can promote blood clot formation in veins.
sentences.cn: 其原因是由于长时间不动，造成静脉血液停滞，促使静脉中血凝块形成。

sentences.en: What causes the risk is immobility.
sentences.cn: “导致这种风险的是一直坐着不动”.

words.tran_cn: 使…不动，使…固定；使…不能调动；使…无机动性
使固定；使不动；使停止流通
